snippet.title: FAITH: CHAPTER II - Pixel Horror Indie Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Bug me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/airdorf
Get your FAITH t-shirt here: https://bit.ly/2H7oTIN

PLAY THE DEMO HERE:
https://airdorf.itch.io/faith2
https://gamejolt.com/games/faithch2/345833
https://www.indiedb.com/games/faith-chapter-ii-demo

FAITH: Chapter II is a pixel horror game inspired by the era of Atari/MS-DOS/Apple II/ZX Spectrum classic gaming and the "Satanic Scare" of the 1980s.

After confronting unspeakable dark entities and narrowly escaping with his life, a young priest descends into a new nightmare.

Play the original FAITH:
https://airdorf.itch.io/faith
https://gamejolt.com/games/faith/287973
http://www.indiedb.com/games/faith1
